channel.title: RSCShadow
channel.description:
[b]RSCShadow[/b], a RuneScape Classic Private Server dedicated to PKing URL: http://www.RSCShadow.com
Our best war so far: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inktFmGYxIU
[b]Experience Rates[/b]: [b]20X[/b] Non-subscribed
[b]About us[/b]: First and foremost, thanks for viewing. RSCShadow is a RuneScape Classic PK server dedicated to bringing you a new and improved RSC experience. With subscriptions, active development on the Web and Gameserver end, as well as Staminus Anti-DDoS as our provider, we can assure you that we will be bringing you the best we can for many months to come. In our provided mission statement we aim to provide you a community oriented home where well constructed idea's are often implemented or deeply considered.
Here's some sneak peaks of our in-game:
[b]Party[/b] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/7655/screenshot4v.png[/img]
[b]Pk Announcements[/b] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/1460/screenshot5g.png[/img]
[b]Custom Area's, Bosses as well as Arena's[/b] [img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/5634/screenshot8a.png[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/595/screenshot4tp.png[/img]
[b]RuneCrafting, also on the skill sheet[/b] [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/1984/screenshot7a.png[/img]
[b]Gambling is Back[/b] [img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/5006/screenshot0k.png[/img]
[b]Online Peak[/b] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/971/screenshot5t.png[/img]
Here is some upcoming updates that have been worked on.
[b]Auction House -- See Video(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=otiNRv8fZnY)[/b] In the auction house you will be able to only put up items that are worth something... i.e. certs dragon items etc etc.. You will not be able to put up Ashes or Bones or anything useless. You will be able to Bid or Buy It Now... If the player is online it will add it to their bank or if they are offline it will still add to their bank. You will have a limit of 3 different items at one time.
[b]Cannons -- See Video(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-uc2V9F4fpE) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8BwM0OStNo[/b]
Random Messages Upon Death -- (Gawdz ownt Pompano or pompano ownt Gawdz' Penis) etc.. Kill Death Ratio -- Highscores Viewable Slower Hit Times-- I.E. Not instant Hitting

its stil gay that is stronger then a 2 handed weapon.umad?

I played in rs2 right up until the point they took pking away and make it a game for little kids…that genie lamp is exactly the same thing as the xp books, and u know it fag…after all thats where u shadow fags get all ur inspiration from.

[quote=“5 1, post:167, topic:346531”]And our Achievements have NOTHING to do with rs2 you idiot. You get a 99 stat, you get lets say a r2h or something.[/quote]Haha maybe not right now…but soon u will be giving achievements for…go 2 varrock and so such n such a task…ur already super psyched about slayer skill…so thats not much of a leap.

[quote=“5 1, post:167, topic:346531”]And yes, we’ve talked about Slayer, because Slayer is sick as fuck. Our mini-game(i made) is “Technically” Slayer.
RSCE is bringing out slayer most likely, they rs2 fags also?[/quote]
RSCE has/is turning into a major angel grindfest catering for rs2 quest skiller fags so they stay addicted n make fagluke rich…that shit server already gay…were talking about shadow here…try n keep on topic pal. umad that this server is taking things from rs2 and shoving em into classic? u shud call this lame hybrid server…RSCNRS2SHADOW

So, we have runecrafting so that makes it a rs2 server? Good to know moron.
[/quote]

RS2 runecrafting
RS2 achievements ur calling “missions”
RS2 genie lamp thing ur calling “experience books”

and no doubht more rs2 shit if i was bothered looking thru ur forums further, there was a mention of the RS2 slayer skill there thinking about implementing…shocking! and btw nab admin clearly says in a post…maces have +3 power over r2hs but with a massive aim cut. umad? i would be if i was playing a rs2 server disguised as a rs classic server too.

Clearly this server is a mix of both RS2 and Classic, not my fault if u dont like it…talk to pomp about it…although the guys got dementia…being 66yrs old and all…so he prolly wont understand what ur talking about…doesnt help hes canadian too =S[/quote]
I lowered the rune mace’s power, it’s only 1 more than r2h(Did this like 2 weeks ago). umad?

And good to know you play rs2 retard. Because I don’t know what the fuck a genie lamp is.
And no1 from our staff knows what that is.

And our Achievements have NOTHING to do with rs2 you idiot. You get a 99 stat, you get lets say a r2h or something.

And yes, we’ve talked about Slayer, because Slayer is sick as fuck. Our mini-game(i made) is “Technically” Slayer.
RSCE is bringing out slayer most likely, they rs2 fags also?
